title: Portugal beats USWNT for 1st time, 2-1, in Alex Morgan's farewell
description: The U.S. women's team stumbled Thursday in its first game since July, allowing a goal in each half that sent Portugal to its first win against the Americans, 2-1 on a night two-time World Cup winner Alex Morgan was feted with a star-studded farewell.
